thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 13 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Service Corp Increases Share Repurchase Authorization

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Service Corp Increases Share Repurchase Authorization
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Service Corporation International :
* SERVICE CORPORATION INTERNATIONAL INCREASES SHARE REPURCHASE AUTHORIZATION AND QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND
* SERVICE CORPORATION INTERNATIONAL - ‍INCREASED AUTHORIZED LEVEL OF REPURCHASES OF ITS COMMON STOCK BY APPROXIMATELY $298 MILLION​
* SERVICE CORPORATION INTERNATIONAL - ‍HAS APPROVED AN INCREASE IN ITS QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND TO SEVENTEEN CENTS PER SHARE OF COMMON STOCK​
* SERVICE CORPORATION INTERNATIONAL - ‍QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND DECLARED TODAY REPRESENTS A 13.3% INCREASE FROM PREVIOUSLY DECLARED QUARTERLY DIVIDEND​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
